articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: North America and India's Thirst for Groundwater May Have Upset Earth's Balance! | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Estimates suggest that pumping out and shifting ginormous amounts of groundwater from one point to another has already increased global sea levels by at least 6 millimetres between 1993 and 2010!
articles.content: On an average day, pumping out water from the ground may seem the most mundane task in the 21st century all you have to do is flick a switch. But the sheer volume of routine activity across the globe… [+2775 chars]

articles.author: Jack Bantock
articles.title: Wyndham Clark wins 2023 US Open, clinching American’s first career major - CNN
articles.description: Wyndham Clark won the 2023 US Open to claim his first major title on Sunday, edging Rory McIlroy in a nail-biting finale at Los Angeles Country Club.
articles.content:
Wyndham Clark won the 2023 US Open to claim his first major title on Sunday, edging Rory McIlroy in a nail-biting finale at Los Angeles Country Club.
